name: Michael Reilly's VR Putting Challenge
description:
Game requires an Oculus Quest to play! Background

Made for a university project I recreated my previous golf game but in VR.

This game was made as a concept to practice and learn how to develop for VR and the Oculus Quest.

Features
  • Four holes
  • A windmill
  • A wireless VR mini-golf experience from your living room.
Future Plans

Their are no plans to pursue this project further. This game was made in the span of around 9 weeks to learn VR development.

Final words

If you decide to play this game it would be very appreciated if you were to give constructive criticism in the comments, this is dire as it will make me a better developer in the future.

If you come across any bugs please tell me so I know what needs to be fixed.

Thank you for looking at my page, I hope you enjoy the game.
